New Records: Juan Soto reached 100 RBIs for the third time in his career.
Cole Ragans had thrown 543 curveballs in his major league career without giving up a home run on the pitch until Juan Soto's home run.
Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a go-ahead two-run home run in the sixth inning despite an injury scare.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. delivered his first career walk-off hit in the 11th inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone praised Juan Soto's resilience and theatrical performance.
Juan Soto expressed relief and frustration after hitting the home run despite injuring himself earlier in the at-bat.
